title: IBM Watson Text to Speech service
introduction: Use the IBM Watson Text to Speech service to synthesize written text to natural-sounding speech. The synthesized audio uses appropriate cadence and intonation for its language and dialect. The documentation describes the Text to Speech service for IBM Cloud, IBM Cloud Pak for Data, and IBM Cloud Pak for Data as a Service.
